video.title: HIV INFECTION RATES IN U.S. HIGHER THAN FIRST THOUGHT
video.description: Researchers with the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention say there are more people newly infected with HIV each year in the U.S. than first thought.  A new test, applied to blood samples in the lab, is able to help distinguish recent HIV infections from others acquired many years ago.  Researchers say they now have a more accurate picture of the HIV epidemic.
